title: Other Restrictions :- In addition to the above restrictions, following general restrictions are also
clause_text: Other Restrictions :- In addition to the above restrictions, following general restrictions are also enforced :- No high tension power line up to 22 KV is to be setup within 1500 meters from unit boundary.

source_pdf.filename: UDCPR Updated 30.01.25 with earlier provisions & corrections_compressed.docx
